tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: AnotherSocialEconomy.com. Report issues at: support@anothersocialeconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: ezToff.com. Report issues at: support@ezToff.com. ezToff.com is a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for booking locally with ezToff, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: ezToff notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short pre-formatted commands

tuv.seg: |--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:[] tags:[] unit-price:[] total-cost:[] due-date:[] {command>footer}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

tu.note: Message informing CC'ed users about the demand creation.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>location>*}: demand's location attributes {demand.metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}.

tu.note: Message informing CC'ed users about the demand creation.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>location>*}: demand's location attributes {demand.metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metada} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}.

tu.note: Message informing CC'ed users about the demand creation.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>location>*}: demand's location attributes {demand.metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

Message informing CC'ed users about the demand creation.| {demand>*}: demand attributes {demand>owner>name}: name of the demand owner {demand>location>*}: demand's location attributes {demand.metadata>*}: optional meta data from the demand (vertical dependent) {message>footer}

tuv.seg: FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? unit-price:? total-cost:? due-date:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metada} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? metadata:{pullCart:{demand>metadata>pullCart},golfCart:{demand>metada>golfCart}} round-price:? total-cost:? tee-time:{demand>dueDate}'.

tu.note: Message confirming a successful demand update.| {0}: demand owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: demand reference {2}: state {3}: due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {4}: expiration date, can be equals to the due date {5}: locale (postal and country codes) and range as defined by entry "long_golf_location_area_details" {6}: quantity {7}: tags {8}: hashtags {9}: cc-ed ids as defined by the entry "short_golf_demand_cced" {10}: number of stores pinged {11}: email thread subject {12}: content of the automatic response cancelling the demand, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_demand_cancelCommand" {13}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {14}: number of pull cart asked {15}: number of golf cart asked {16}: locale {17}: range

Message informing CC'ed users about the demand update.| {0}: demand owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: demand reference {2}: state {3}: due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {4}: expiration date, can be equals to the due date {5}: locale (postal and country codes) and range as defined by entry "long_golf_location_area_details" {6}: quantity {7}: tags {8}: hashtags {9}: cc-ed ids as defined by the entry "short_golf_demand_cced" {10}: number of stores pinged {11}: email thread subject {12}: content of the automatic response cancelling the demand, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_demand_cancelCommand" {13}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {14}: number of pull cart asked {15}: number of golf cart asked {16}: locale {17}: range

Message confirming a successful proposal creation.| {0}: proposal owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: proposal reference {2}: demand reference {3}: state {4}: due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {5}: quantity {6}: tags {7}: hashtags {8}: currency sign {9}: unit price (10}: total price {11}: email thread subject {12}: content of the automatic response cancelling the proposal, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_proposal_cancelCommand" {13}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {14}: number of pull cart proposed {15}: number of golf cart proposed

Message confirming a successful proposal creation.| {0}: proposal owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: proposal reference {2}: demand reference {3}: state {4}: due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {5}: quantity {6}: tags {7}: hashtags {8}: currency sign {9}: unit price (10}: total price {11}: email thread subject {12}: content of the automatic response cancelling the proposal, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_proposal_cancelCommand" {13}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {14}: number of pull cart proposed {15}: number of golf cart proposed

Message informing the demand owner about a proposal creation.| {0}: demand owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: demand reference {2}: demand due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {3}: demand expiration date, can be equals to the due date {4}: demand quantity {5}: demand tags {6}: demand hashtags {7}: proposal reference {8}: proposal due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {9}: proposal quantity {10}: proposal tags {11}: proposal hashtags {12}: currency sign {13}: unit price (14}: total price {15}: store reference {16}: store name {17}: store address {18}: store website {19}: store phone number {20}: store postal code {21}: store country code {22}: email thread subject {23}: content of the automatic response to confirm the proposal, as defined by the entry "long_golf_proposal_confirmCommand" {24}: content of the automatic response to decline the proposal, as defined by the entry "long_golf_proposal_declineCommand" {25}: content of the automatic response to cancel the demand, as defined by the entry "long_golf_demand_cancelCommand" {26}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {27}: number of pull cart asked {28}: number of golf cart asked

tuv.seg:
Hi {0},
The reservation under ezToff Proposal# {9} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using ezToff, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {22}
Reference#: {1}.
